attributes.title: Don't even get me started
attributes.review: I was so excited to finally be able to support our wonderful President, but upon downloading, my phone's speakers started continuously playing the words "grab her by the p*ssy". Along with that, it asked for my race and when anything other than white was chosen, a pop up would show up that told the user to 'go back to their country.' All in all, pretty glitchy. Probably out of context. Do not download. (Also, though. Black Lives Matter, Defund the Police, Settle for Biden, LGBTQ+ rights, No More Stolen Sisters, humanity outranks economy <3)

attributes.title: this app ruined my life
attributes.review: hello everyone. I would like to tell you that this app ruined my life, and that you should not get it. after I downloaded it, it kept making my phone crash and malfunction. one day it crashed as I was sending nudes to my boyfriend and it made me accidentally send the pics to all of my contacts. my ex did NOT deserve to see my marvelous, voluptuous buttocks ever again... but whatever. Furthermore, my parents saw it and said that they werenâ€™t even good nudes so they disowned me. now I am living alone on the streets, with nothing but me, my sorrow and this god forsaken app. So, everyone, if you want to keep your life intact, do NOT download this app:)
